title: Cricket Static Free Fast Flo
description: Eliminates fly aways that lead to stick up static hair. A great styler to sculpt hair the way you want during blow drying. Includes a rubber non slip grip for easier control. Long, plastic non snag bristles that won't tangle hair and are gentle on the scalp. Sculpt and style hair the way you want without worrying about unnecessary static and cling.

title: Turbie Twist 3 Pack (Colors May Vary)
description: The Hair Towel that's specially designed for wrapping wet or dry hair. Simply slip over hair then twist, loop and it's there to stay! Turbie Twist's tapered design fits on any head, is microfiber and lightweight. This Hair Towel is attractive, functional and so comfortable! One size fits all

title: Philosophy Hope in a Jar Daily Moisturizer, Dry Skin, 2 Ounce
description: A creamy, soothing daily moisturizer that helps improve the natural moisture balance, while soothing and comforting the skin.
